stories.title: Implement Testing Framework
stories.description: Add a testing framework to ensure code reliability and enable TDD practices. Install RSpec as the testing framework, configure it for the Roda application, and write basic unit tests for existing models and routes.
acceptance_criteria: RSpec gem added to Gemfile and installed
spec/ directory created with proper structure
.rspec configuration file added
Basic unit tests written for User model (validations, authentication)
Basic integration tests for authentication routes
Tests pass when running rspec command

stories.title: Configure Code Linting and Formatting
stories.description: Set up RuboCop for consistent code style and automatic formatting. Configure rules suitable for the Roda/Ruby codebase and fix any existing linting issues.
acceptance_criteria: RuboCop gem added to Gemfile and installed
.rubocop.yml configuration file created with appropriate rules
All existing code passes RuboCop checks without offenses
Pre-commit hook or rake task added to run linting automatically
Documentation added explaining how to run linting

stories.title: Update and Audit Dependencies
stories.description: Review and update all gem dependencies to their latest compatible versions. Audit for security vulnerabilities and ensure the Gemfile.lock is up to date.
acceptance_criteria: All gems updated to latest compatible versions
bundle audit run and any vulnerabilities addressed
Gemfile.lock committed with updated versions
Test suite passes after updates
bin/setup script still works correctly

stories.title: Improve Code Aesthetics and Organization
stories.description: Refactor code for better readability and maintainability. Organize imports, add comments where needed, and ensure consistent naming conventions throughout the codebase.
acceptance_criteria: All Ruby files formatted consistently (spaces, indentation)
Unused code and variables removed
Methods and classes properly documented with comments
File and directory structure optimized for clarity
No long methods (refactor if > 20 lines)

stories.title: Enhance Documentation
stories.description: Improve project documentation including README, code comments, and setup instructions to make the repository more accessible and maintainable.
acceptance_criteria: README.md updated with comprehensive project description, setup, and usage instructions
API documentation added for key routes and models
Inline code comments added for complex logic
Contributing guidelines added
Architecture overview documented

stories.title: Set Up Continuous Integration
stories.description: Implement a CI pipeline using GitHub Actions to automatically run tests, linting, and security checks on pull requests and pushes.
acceptance_criteria: .github/workflows/ci.yml created
CI runs tests, linting, and bundle audit on every push/PR
Badge added to README showing CI status
CI configuration documented
All checks pass on main branch
